SELECT l.idx, l.lodging_num, l.lodging_name, l.user_id, l.reg_state, l.create_dt, IFNULL(ROUND((r.clean_grade + r.accuracy_grade + r.communication_grade + r.location_grade + r.check_in_grade + r.cost_grade) / 6, 1), 0) as review, IFNULL(c.count, 0) as count FROM lodging AS l LEFT JOIN (SELECT user_id, lodging_num, reason, reason_detail, complain_dt, deleted_yn, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM complain GROUP BY lodging_num) c ON l.lodging_num = c.lodging_num LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lodging_num = r.lodging_num GROUP BY l.lodging_num ORDER BY 1 DESC;
